remarks: The value of a function.  Version of ~ funfvdm2 using a bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 1-Jan-2019.)
statement:
funfvdm2f.1 $e |- F/_ y A $.
funfvdm2f.2 $e |- F/_ y F $.
funfvdm2f $p |- ( ( Fun F /\ A e. dom F ) -> ( F ` A ) = U. { y | A F y } ) $.
